description:
It’s a duel for control of KaibaCorp when Noa squares off against Kaiba!  But can Kaiba fight at full strength after he learns the hidden truth about Noa... and the tragic past that made him what he is today?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Noa vs Seto: Tenchi Souzou no Duel
Noa vs Seto: The Duel at Creation
乃亜VS瀬人 天地創造の決闘[デュエル]
